column1: The Uruk-hai attack on Osgiliath in  was the first large-scale attack against Gondor after the end of the Watchful Peace.  The race of uruks
column2: described as black Orcs of great strength
column3: first appeared in this battle and were able to sweep across Ithilien and take Osgiliath.  Boromir (Steward of Gondor) son of Denethor I was able to defeat this force and clear them from Ithilien
column4: but the city was finally ruined
column6: and no one lived in the city thereafter.  During this brief war Boromir received a Morgul-wound that shrunk him with pain and caused his premature death but twelve years after his father.
